GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10.8 to before v5.10.37
GSD.description:
regmap: set debugfs_name to NULL after it is freed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.37 by commit eb949f891226c012138ffd9df90d1e509f428ae6, it was introduced in version v5.10.8 by commit c9698380b01aed3281160d3ab25749b57d6913b8. For more details please see the references link.
